The claim is based on a TV ad for Democr: 2. The ad uses video footage of Kasich talking with reporters after announcing his proposal to replace the Ohio Department of Development with JobsOhio, a nonprofit corporation operated with private money.
The ad quotes Kasich as saying: We won't have any pay restrictions there. If they deserve a bonus, we'll give them a bonus. You all are familiar with bonuses. We will not require them to disclose their bonus."
PolitiFact Ohio examined the claim and f: s comments and proposal differed somewhat from the claim made in the ad.
